Item.name: L0_Sword1
Item.versicle: Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.

Item.name: L0_Sword2
Item.versicle: Before they call I will answer; while they are still speaking I will hear.

Item.name: L0_Sword3
Item.versicle: Wisdom reposes in the heart of the discerning.

Item.name: L0_Sword4
Item.versicle: A heart at peace gives life to the body, but envy rots the bones.

Item.name: L0_Sword5
Item.versicle: A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit.

Item.name: L0_Sword6
Item.versicle: You are altogether beautiful, my darling; there is no flaw in you.

Item.name: L0_Sword7
Item.versicle: Walk in obedience, love him, serve the Lord with all your heart and soul

Item.name: L0_Sword8
Item.versicle: Fear the Lord your God and serve him.

Item.name: L0_Sword9
Item.versicle: To the Lord belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it.

Item.name: L0_Sword10
Item.versicle: The Lord your God is bringing you into a good land, a land with brooks and streams

Item.name: L0_Sword11
Item.versicle: A man disciplines his son, so the Lord your God disciplines you.

Item.name: L0_Sword12
Item.versicle: He will love you and bless you and increase your numbers. He will bless the fruit of your land

Item.name: L0_Sword13
Item.versicle: Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.

Item.name: L0_Sword14
Item.versicle: Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

Item.name: L0_Sword15
Item.versicle: but showing love to a thousand generations of those who love me and keep my commandments.

Item.name: L0_Sword16
Item.versicle: You saw no form of any kind the day the Lord spoke to you at Horeb

Item.name: L0_Sword17
Item.versicle: But if from there you seek the Lord your God, you will find Him

Item.name: L0_Sword18
Item.versicle: But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord.

Item.name: L0_Sword19
Item.versicle: I will sing of the Lord’s great love forever

Item.name: L0_Sword20
Item.versicle: By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another

Item.name: L1_Sword1
Item.versicle: Encomienda a Jehová tus obras, Y tus pensamientos serán afirmados.

Item.name: L1_Sword2
Item.versicle: Y antes que clamen, responderé yo; mientras aún hablan, yo habré oído.

Item.name: L1_Sword3
Item.versicle: En el corazón del prudente reposa la sabiduría

Item.name: L1_Sword4
Item.versicle: El corazón apacible es vida de la carne; Mas la envidia es carcoma de los huesos

Item.name: L1_Sword5
Item.versicle: El corazón alegre hermosea el rostro; Mas por el dolor del corazón el espíritu se abate.

Item.name: L1_Sword6
Item.versicle: Toda tú eres hermosa, amiga mía, Y en ti no hay mancha.

Item.name: L1_Sword7
Item.versicle: Que andes en todos sus caminos, y que lo ames, y sirvas a Jehová tu Dios con todo tu corazón y con toda tu alma

Item.name: L1_Sword8
Item.versicle: SPA_Fear the Lord your God and serve him.

Item.name: L1_Sword9
Item.versicle: SPA_To the Lord belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it.

Item.name: L1_Sword10
Item.versicle: SPA_The Lord your God is bringing you into a good land, a land with brooks and streams

Item.name: L1_Sword11
Item.versicle: SPA_A man disciplines his son, so the Lord your God disciplines you.

Item.name: L1_Sword12
Item.versicle: SPA_He will love you and bless you and increase your numbers. He will bless the fruit of your land

Item.versicle: SPA_Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.

Item.name: L1_Sword14
Item.versicle: SPA_Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

Item.name: L1_Sword15

Item.name: L1_Sword17
Item.versicle: SPA_But if from there you seek the Lord your God, you will find Him

Item.name: L1_Sword18
Item.versicle: SPA_But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord.

Item.name: L1_Sword19
Item.versicle: SPA_I will sing of the Lord’s great love forever

Item.name: L1_Sword20
Item.versicle: SPA_By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you love one another

Item.name: L2_Sword1
Item.versicle: Recommande tes œuvres à l'Eternel, et tes projets se réaliseront.

Item.name: L2_Sword2
Item.versicle: Alors, avant qu'ils ne m'invoquent, je les exaucerai; ils parleront encore, que j'aurai déjà entendu

Item.name: L2_Sword3
Item.versicle: La sagesse repose dans un esprit intelligent

Item.name: L2_Sword4
Item.versicle: Un cœur paisible contribue à la vie du corps; mais l'envie est comme une maladie qui ronge les os.

Item.name: L2_Sword5
Item.versicle: Un cœur joyeux rend le visage aimable, mais quand le cœur est triste, l'esprit est abattu.

Item.name: L2_Sword6
Item.versicle: «Que tu es belle, ô mon amie, tu es parfaitement belle, sans un défaut.

Item.name: L2_Sword7
Item.versicle: que tu le révères en suivant toutes les voies qu'il t'a prescrites, en l'aimant et en le servant de tout ton cœur et de tout ton être

Item.name: L2_Sword8
Item.versicle: FRN_Fear the Lord your God and serve him.

Item.name: L2_Sword9
Item.versicle: FRN_To the Lord belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it.

Item.name: L2_Sword10

Item.name: L3_Sword1
Item.versicle: Befiehl dem HERRN deine Werke, so werden deine Anschläge fortgehen.

Item.name: L3_Sword2
Item.versicle: Und soll geschehen, ehe sie rufen, will ich antworten; wenn sie noch reden, will ich hören.

Item.name: L3_Sword3
Item.versicle: Im Herzen der umsichtige Weisheit ruht

Item.name: L3_Sword4
Item.versicle: Ein gütiges Herz ist des Leibes Leben; aber Neid ist Eiter in den Gebeinen.

Item.name: L3_Sword5
Item.versicle: Ein fröhlich Herz macht ein fröhlich Angesicht; aber wenn das Herz bekümmert ist, so fällt auch der Mut.

Item.name: L3_Sword6
Item.versicle: Du bist allerdinge schön, meine Freundin, und ist kein Flecken an dir.

Item.name: L3_Sword7
Item.versicle: GER_Walk in obedience, love him, serve the Lord with all your heart and soul

Item.name: L3_Sword8
Item.versicle: GER_Fear the Lord your God and serve him.

Item.name: L4_Sword1
Item.versicle: Affida al Signore la tua attività e i tuoi progetti riusciranno.

Item.name: L4_Sword2
Item.versicle: Prima che mi invochino, io risponderò; mentre ancora stanno parlando, io gia li avrò ascoltati.

Item.name: L4_Sword3
Item.versicle: In un cuore assennato risiede la sapienza

Item.name: L4_Sword4
Item.versicle: Un cuore tranquillo è la vita di tutto il corpo, l'invidia è la carie delle ossa.

Item.name: L4_Sword5
Item.versicle: Un cuore lieto rende ilare il volto, ma, quando il cuore è triste, lo spirito è depresso.

Item.name: L4_Sword6
Item.versicle: Tutta bella tu sei, amica mia, in te nessuna macchia.

Item.name: L4_Sword7
Item.versicle: ITA_Walk in obedience, love him, serve the Lord with all your heart and soul

Item.name: L4_Sword8
Item.versicle: ITA_Fear the Lord your God and serve him.

Item.name: L4_Sword9
Item.versicle: ITA_To the Lord belong the heavens, even the highest heavens, the earth and everything in it.

Item.name: L4_Sword10
Item.versicle: ITA_The Lord your God is bringing you into a good land, a land with brooks and streams

Item.versicle: ITA_A man disciplines his son, so the Lord your God disciplines you.

Item.versicle: ITA_He will love you and bless you and increase your numbers. He will bless the fruit of your land

Item.versicle: ITA_Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God, the Lord is one.

Item.name: L4_Sword14
Item.versicle: ITA_Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.

Item.name: L4_Sword15
Item.versicle: ITA_but showing love to a thousand generations of those who love me and keep my commandments.

Item.name: L4_Sword16
Item.versicle: ITA_You saw no form of any kind the day the Lord spoke to you at Horeb

Item.versicle: ITA_But if from there you seek the Lord your God, you will find Him

Item.name: L4_Sword18
Item.versicle: ITA_But as for me and my household, we will serve the Lord.

Item.name: L4_Sword20

Item.name: L5_Sword1
Item.versicle: Consagre ao Senhor tudo o que você faz, e os seus planos serão bem-sucedidos.

Item.name: L5_Sword2
Item.versicle: Antes de clamarem, eu responderei; ainda não estarão falando, e eu os ouvirei.

Item.name: L5_Sword3
Item.versicle: NA sabedoria repousa no coração dos que têm discernimento

Item.name: L5_Sword4
Item.versicle: O coração em paz dá vida ao corpo, mas a inveja apodrece os ossos.

Item.name: L5_Sword5
Item.versicle: A alegria do coração transparece no rosto, mas o coração angustiado oprime o espírito.

Item.name: L5_Sword6
Item.versicle: Você é toda linda, minha querida; em você não há defeito algum.

Item.name: L5_Sword7
Item.versicle: POR_Walk in obedience, love him, serve the Lord with all your heart and soul

Item.name: L5_Sword8
Item.versicle: POR_Fear the Lord your God and serve him.
